inlineContent.text: The connection sending this message
The completion handler for passing an identity and certificate chain to the connection.
The
is required and must not be
The
argument is optional, and is an array of one or more
objects.
The certificate chain must contain objects of type
only.
If the certificate chain is set, it will be used.
Otherwise, the leaf certificate will be extracted from the
object and will be used for authentication.
The caller is responsible for keeping the argument object(s) valid for the duration of the completion handler invocation.
Optional. If this method is not implemented, the default certificate evaluation will be used.

abstract.text: Secure the data your app manages, and control access to your app.
An abstract Core Foundation-type object representing an X.509 certificate.
An abstract Core Foundation-type object representing an identity.
Customize and extend core networking features.
An object to manage a TCP connection, with or without TLS.
A delegate protocol to customize the TLS authentication done by a connection.
Override the default trust evaluation for the connection.
Provide the identity and an optional certificate chain to be used for authentication.
Indicate that the delegate should override the default trust evaluation for the connection.
Indicate that the delegate can provide an identity for the connection authentication.
An abstract Core Foundation-type object representing an identity.
The return type of functions that donâ€™t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
